title: Harnessing nanobiotechnology for drought stress: transforming agriculture's future; what, why and how?
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2861-2884
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00112E, Critical Review
Shahid Ullah Khan, Muhammad Sirab Khan, Hui Wang, Mingchao Qian, Talha Javed, Shah Fahad, Kun Lu
Nanobiotechnology has received tremendous attention in recent years owing to its wide range of applications in various fields.
